EmailTemplate.name: System Master_Sales_Email.WWSKO 2-9-14
EmailTemplate.subject: Socialcast is the social platform for WWSKO
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Team,
By now you should have joined the WWSKO group on Socialcast and downloaded the mobile app to your device. Use your Socialcast App during kick-off to:
- Access the agenda: wwsko2014a.sched.org/mobile/ <http://wwsko2014a.sched.org/mobile/> - Connect with your peers and follow them: @ and # tags - Make plans to meet in the evening to discuss sales tactics over cool beverages - Post photos (selfies, beautiful shots of Monterey, your colleague giving a presentation) - Ask questions, give feedback and exchange ideas - Give thanks to a colleague for a job well done - Get engaged in the conversation! #WWSKO <https://gopivotal-com.socialcast.com/topics/wwsko>
<https://gopivotal-com.socialcast.com/topics/wwsko>
Make sure you have the Socialcast Mobile App for your device. Go here https://sites.google.com/a/gopivotal.com/pivotal-marketing-programs/resources/wwsko-socialcast <https://sites.google.com/a/gopivotal.com/pivotal-marketing-programs/resources/wwsko-socialcast> for instructions.
Still have questions? See one of us at the Socialcast Help Desk onsite next to Registration.
Socialcast Help Desk Hours:
- Monday 3-7 PM - Tuesday 7-10 AM
Email or Message WWSKO-Admin@gopivotal.com <mailto:WWSKO-Admin@gopivotal.com> Can't wait to see you all next week!
Best,
